custom_nodes.name: ComfyUI-Svg2Raster
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node to load SVG files and rasterize them into images, with options for resizing, background color, and borders.
custom_nodes.author: garg-aayush
custom_nodes.install_msg: This node requires the 'Cairo' graphics library to be installed on your system. Please see the installation instructions in the README for details before using this node.
